definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The division sign on the left mudguard is white.
sentences.chinese: 左挡泥板上的帝国师临时师徽为白色。

sentences.english: If equipped, remove the radio antenna mast, and components from the fender .
sentences.chinese: 如果装备了无线电天线罩和零件，从挡泥板拆下它们。

sentences.english: His car bruised the auto fender of my car.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车撞瘪了我的汽车挡泥板。

sentences.english: When my father sees the dent in his fender, he'll be mad as hornet.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲看到汽车挡泥板上的凹痕时，他一定会发怒的。

sentences.english: The impact  dented our car's fender.
sentences.chinese: 碰撞把我们汽车挡泥板给撞凹下去了。

sentences.english: Install the bolts attaching the end cap to the front fender.
sentences.chinese: 安装连接末端端盖到前挡泥板的螺栓。

sentences.english: A couple of screwdrivers rolled off my fender mat onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 两支螺丝刀从我的挡泥板垫上滚到了地板上。

sentences.english: The wheel' s rubbing on the mudguard.
The wheel was rubbing on the mudguard.
The hood, cowl, radiator and fenders are scratch-built.
sentences.chinese: 发动机罩，罩，散热器和挡泥板是从零开始建造。

sentences.english: Hammered out the dents in the fender; hammered out a contract acceptable to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲看到汽车挡泥板上的凹痕时，他一定会发怒的。

sentences.english: The wheel's rubbing on the mudguard.
The dent on the wing of our car can be beaten out at the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们汽车挡泥板上的凹痕可以在汽车修理厂敲平。

sentences.english: The basic prescription and its characteristic of plastic mudguard for automobiles areintroduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了汽车塑料挡泥板的基本配方及其性能。

sentences.english: Finally I lit a cigarette and flopped over the fender mat.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我点了一支香烟，瘫坐在挡泥板垫上。
